This undertaking held considerable importance within the context of my second-year Java course at the university. The primary goal was to conceive and create a unique, playable game using the Java programming language. Moreover, the project featured a user-input mechanism for determining the map size, alongside the provision of pre-defined selectable levels. The complete source code for the project can be accessed through the GitHub link provided above.

Random Maze Android Application

Created in 2023, Social links: GitHub
